reviewText: I just finished watching Die Hard One again and it is still really good. It brings up the terrorist attack feelings so be warned. The wit Bruce Willis displays is just right for this type of a film and his heroics are believable. I definately would recommend this to an action lover, it keeps going with suspense and doesn't get to out there with disbelief. I suggest watching with a few cold beers and a big bowl of popcorn. Lisa Nary
